sections.heading: Short title.
sections.text: This Act may be cited as the Interstate Compact for Adult Offender Supervision.

sections.heading: Interstate Compact for Adult Offender Supervision.
sections.text:
The Governor
of this State is hereby authorized and directed to
enter into a compact on behalf of this State with any of the United States
legally joining therein in the form substantially as follows:ARTICLE I:PURPOSE

sections.heading: The Unified Code of Corrections is amended by repealing Section 3-3-11.
sections.text: The Unified Code of Corrections is amended by repealing Section 3-3-11.

sections.heading: Effective date.
sections.text:
This Act takes effect upon the enactment
of the Interstate Compact for Adult Offender Supervision by 35 States, except
that this Section, Article IV of Section 5, and Section 3-3-11.05 of the
Unified Code of Corrections take effect upon becoming law.
